properties.name: AllowCredentials
properties.description: Specifies whether credentials are included in the CORS request.

type.description: Specifies whether credentials are included in the CORS request.

properties.name: AllowHeaders
properties.description: Represents a collection of allowed headers.

type.description: Represents a collection of allowed headers.

properties.name: AllowMethods
properties.description: Represents a collection of allowed HTTP methods.

type.description: Represents a collection of allowed HTTP methods.

properties.name: AllowOrigins
properties.description: Represents a collection of allowed origins.

type.description: Represents a collection of allowed origins.

properties.name: ExposeHeaders
properties.description: Represents a collection of exposed headers.

type.description: Represents a collection of exposed headers.

properties.name: AuthType
properties.description: Can be either AWS_IAM if the requests are authorized via IAM, or NONE if no authorization is configured on the Function URL.

type.description: Can be either AWS_IAM if the requests are authorized via IAM, or NONE if no authorization is configured on the Function URL.

properties.name: InvokeMode
properties.description: The invocation mode for the function’s URL. Set to BUFFERED if you want to buffer responses before returning them to the client. Set to RESPONSE_STREAM if you want to stream responses, allowing faster time to first byte and larger response payload sizes. If not set, defaults to BUFFERED.

type.description: The invocation mode for the function’s URL. Set to BUFFERED if you want to buffer responses before returning them to the client. Set to RESPONSE_STREAM if you want to stream responses, allowing faster time to first byte and larger response payload sizes. If not set, defaults to BUFFERED.

properties.name: Qualifier
properties.description: The alias qualifier for the target function. If TargetFunctionArn is unqualified then Qualifier must be passed.

type.description: The alias qualifier for the target function. If TargetFunctionArn is unqualified then Qualifier must be passed.

properties.name: TargetFunctionArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function associated with the Function URL.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function associated with the Function URL.

properties.name: FunctionArn
properties.description: The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function associated with the Function URL.

type.description: The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function associated with the Function URL.

properties.name: FunctionUrl
properties.description: The generated url for this resource.

type.description: The generated url for this resource.
